languages.text: "Вести дела?.." {n}Гемункул выглядит озадаченным.{/n} "Я не буду вести с тобой дела. Я буду тебя использовать. Ты пережил{mf||а} бой на арене, а значит, обладаешь незаурядными для своего вида параметрами. И пусть ты относишься к ущербной расе, с высоты моей мудрости очень тяжело увидеть отличие между твоей неполноценностью и неполноценностью большинства моих сородичей".

"'Do business'?" {n}The Haemonculus looks puzzled.{/n} "I will do no business with you. I will use you. You survived a battle in the arena, which means you have uncommon parameters for your kind. You are a lesser organism, true, but the towering heights of my wisdom make it difficult to distinguish between your inferiority and the inferiority of most of my kin."
languages.original_text: "Вести дела?.." {n}Гемункул выглядит озадаченным.{/n} "Я не буду вести с тобой дела. Я буду тебя использовать. Ты пережил{mf||а} бой на арене, а значит, обладаешь незаурядными для своего вида параметрами. И пусть ты относишься к ущербной расе, с высоты моей мудрости очень тяжело увидеть отличие между твоей неполноценностью и неполноценностью большинства моих сородичей".

traits.locale_text: "'Do business'?" {n}The Haemonculus looks puzzled.{/n} "I will do no business with you. I will use you. You survived a fight in the arena, and that means you possess parameters that are rare among your kind. You may be a lesser organism, but, from the height of my wisdom, it is exceedingly difficult to differentiate between your inferiority and the deficiency of the majority of my kin."

"'Do business'?" {n}The Haemonculus looks puzzled.{/n} "I will do no business with you. I will use you. You survived a fight in the arena, and that means you possess parameters that are rare among your kind. You may be a lesser organism, but, from the height of my wisdom, it is exceedingly difficult to differentiate between your inferiority and the deficiency of the majority of my kin."

You are a lesser organism, true, but the towering heights of my wisdom make it difficult to distinguish between your inferiority and the inferiority of most of my kin."

You are a lesser organism, true, but the towering heights of my wisdom make it difficult to distinguish between your inferiority and the inferiority of most of my kin."

You are a lesser organism, true, but the towering heights of my wisdom make it difficult to distinguish between your inferiority and the inferiority of most of my kin."

You are a lesser organism, true, but the towering heights of my wisdom make it difficult to distinguish between your inferiority and the inferiority of most of my kin."

languages.text: « Faire affaire ? {n}L'hémoncule semble dérouté.{/n} Je ne vais pas faire affaire avec vous. Je vais vous utiliser. Vous avez survécu à l'arène, ce qui indique que vos aptitudes sont hors norme pour votre espèce. Vous êtes un organisme aux capacités limitées, certes, mais ma sagesse sans égale me permet difficilement de distinguer votre infériorité de celle des membres de ma propre espèce. »
languages.original_text: "'Do business'?" {n}The Haemonculus looks puzzled.{/n} "I will do no business with you. I will use you. You survived a battle in the arena, which means you have uncommon parameters for your kind. You are a lesser organism, true, but the towering heights of my wisdom make it difficult to distinguish between your inferiority and the inferiority of most of my kin."

traits.locale_text: « Faire affaire ? {n}L'hémoncule semble dérouté.{/n} Je ne vais pas faire affaire avec vous. Je vais vous utiliser. Vous avez survécu à l'arène, ce qui indique que vos aptitudes sont hors norme pour votre espèce. Vous êtes un organisme aux capacités limitées, certes, mais ma sagesse sans égale me permet difficilement de distinguer votre infériorité de celle des membres de ma propre espèce. »

languages.text: “做生意？”{n}血伶人看起来很困惑。{/n}“我并不打算和你做生意，我打算利用你。你能从竞技场的战斗中存活下来，这意味着你拥有你这个族群罕见的参数。你确实是只低等生物，但我实在是过于睿智，因此无论是低劣的猴子，还是我那些低劣的同族，在我看来都没什么区别。”
languages.original_text: "'Do business'?" {n}The Haemonculus looks puzzled.{/n} "I will do no business with you. I will use you. You survived a battle in the arena, which means you have uncommon parameters for your kind. You are a lesser organism, true, but the towering heights of my wisdom make it difficult to distinguish between your inferiority and the inferiority of most of my kin."

traits.locale_text: “做生意？”{n}血伶人看起来很困惑。{/n}“我并不打算和你做生意，我打算利用你。你能从竞技场的战斗中存活下来，这意味着你拥有你这个族群罕见的参数。你确实是只低等生物，但我实在是过于睿智，因此无论是低劣的猴子，还是我那些低劣的同族，在我看来都没什么区别。”

languages.text: "'Geschäfte machen'?" {n}Der Haemonculus sieht verwirrt aus.{/n} "Ich werde mit Euch keine Geschäfte machen. Ich werde Euch ausnutzen. Ihr habt einen Kampf in der Arena überlebt. Das bedeutet, dass Ihr für Eure Spezies ungewöhnliche Parameter habt. Ihr seid ein niederer Organismus, ja, doch die gewaltigen Ausmaße meiner Weisheit machen es schwer, zwischen Eurer Unterlegenheit und der Unterlegenheit der meisten meiner Verwandten zu unterscheiden."
languages.original_text: "'Do business'?" {n}The Haemonculus looks puzzled.{/n} "I will do no business with you. I will use you. You survived a battle in the arena, which means you have uncommon parameters for your kind. You are a lesser organism, true, but the towering heights of my wisdom make it difficult to distinguish between your inferiority and the inferiority of most of my kin."

traits.locale_text: "'Geschäfte machen'?" {n}Der Haemonculus sieht verwirrt aus.{/n} "Ich werde mit Euch keine Geschäfte machen. Ich werde Euch ausnutzen. Ihr habt einen Kampf in der Arena überlebt. Das bedeutet, dass Ihr für Eure Spezies ungewöhnliche Parameter habt. Ihr seid ein niederer Organismus, ja, doch die gewaltigen Ausmaße meiner Weisheit machen es schwer, zwischen Eurer Unterlegenheit und der Unterlegenheit der meisten meiner Verwandten zu unterscheiden."

languages.text: «¿Negocios?». {n}El Hemónculo parece perplejo.{/n}«No voy a llevar a cabo ningún tipo de negocio contigo. Voy a usarte. Has sobrevivido a una batalla en la arena, lo que significa que tus parámetros son distintos a los de tu especie. A pesar de que eres un organismo menor, mi grandiosa inteligencia no logra distinguir entre tu inferioridad y la inferioridad de la mayoría de mis congéneres».
languages.original_text: "'Do business'?" {n}The Haemonculus looks puzzled.{/n} "I will do no business with you. I will use you. You survived a battle in the arena, which means you have uncommon parameters for your kind. You are a lesser organism, true, but the towering heights of my wisdom make it difficult to distinguish between your inferiority and the inferiority of most of my kin."

traits.locale_text: «¿Negocios?». {n}El Hemónculo parece perplejo.{/n}«No voy a llevar a cabo ningún tipo de negocio contigo. Voy a usarte. Has sobrevivido a una batalla en la arena, lo que significa que tus parámetros son distintos a los de tu especie. A pesar de que eres un organismo menor, mi grandiosa inteligencia no logra distinguir entre tu inferioridad y la inferioridad de la mayoría de mis congéneres».

languages.text: 「取り引きだと？」{n}ハモンキュラスは困惑の表情を浮かべる。{/n}「取り引きなどしない。お前のことは利用するまでだ。お前はアリーナでの戦いを生き延びた。つまりその種族としては珍しいパラメーターを持っているんだ。お前が下等生物であることは事実だが、私の叡智の高さで、お前の劣等性と、私のキンの大半が持つ劣等性を区別するのは困難だ」
languages.original_text: "'Do business'?" {n}The Haemonculus looks puzzled.{/n} "I will do no business with you. I will use you. You survived a battle in the arena, which means you have uncommon parameters for your kind. You are a lesser organism, true, but the towering heights of my wisdom make it difficult to distinguish between your inferiority and the inferiority of most of my kin."

traits.locale_text: 「取り引きだと？」{n}ハモンキュラスは困惑の表情を浮かべる。{/n}「取り引きなどしない。お前のことは利用するまでだ。お前はアリーナでの戦いを生き延びた。つまりその種族としては珍しいパラメーターを持っているんだ。お前が下等生物であることは事実だが、私の叡智の高さで、お前の劣等性と、私のキンの大半が持つ劣等性を区別するのは困難だ」

languages.text: "'İş yapmak' mı?" {n}Haimonkulus şaşırmışa benziyor.{/n} "Ben sizinle iş yapmam. Ben sizi kullanırım. Arenadaki bir çatışmadan sağ çıktın, bu da türünün diğer örneklerinden daha üst düzey parametrelere sahip olduğun anlamına geliyor. Alt seviye bir organizmasın, doğru. Fakat sahip olduğum bilgelik o kadar üst seviye ki sizin adiliğinizle kendi türümün çoğu mensubunun adiliği arasındaki farkı ayırt etmekte zorlanıyorum."
languages.original_text: "'Do business'?" {n}The Haemonculus looks puzzled.{/n} "I will do no business with you. I will use you. You survived a battle in the arena, which means you have uncommon parameters for your kind. You are a lesser organism, true, but the towering heights of my wisdom make it difficult to distinguish between your inferiority and the inferiority of most of my kin."

traits.locale_text: "'İş yapmak' mı?" {n}Haimonkulus şaşırmışa benziyor.{/n} "Ben sizinle iş yapmam. Ben sizi kullanırım. Arenadaki bir muharebeden sağ çıktın, bu da türünün diğer örneklerinden daha üst düzey parametrelere sahip olduğun anlamına geliyor. Alt seviye bir organizmasın, doğru. Ama sahip olduğum bilgelik o kadar üst seviyelerdedir ki, sizin adiliğinizle kendi türümün çoğu üyesinin adiliği arasındaki farkı ayırt etmekte zorlanıyorum."
